title: Work Mitra
description: WorkMitra is a service marketplace web app connecting users with local providers, featuring real-time booking, and provider dashboards.

title: Expense Tracker
description: I created a expense tracker Web application ,which have features like adding our spending,and our monthly budget.For visualizing the data i used pie charts.

title: Alumini Association
description: I developed a basic Alumni Association Platform using HTML and CSS to create a structured and visually appealing interface for alumni connections.
